scripts.dev: npm run build && budo src/aframe-core.js:build/aframe-core.js --debug --verbose --port 9001 --onupdate 'semistandard -v $(git ls-files "*.js") | snazzy' -- ./src/aframe-core.js -s 'aframe-core' | garnish -v
scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && npm run browserify -- --debug -o build/aframe-core.js
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/ && npm run dist:js && npm run dist:css
scripts.dist:js: npm run browserify -- --debug -o dist/aframe-core.js && uglifyjs dist/aframe-core.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/aframe-core.min.js
scripts.preghpages: npm run dist && rm -rf gh-pages && mkdir -p gh-pages && cp -r {.nojekyll,dist,lib,examples,style,index.html} gh-pages/. && git checkout dist/ && replace 'build/aframe-core.js' 'dist/aframe-core.min.js' gh-pages/ -r --silent && replace 'style/aframe-core.css' 'dist/aframe-core.min.css' gh-pages/ -r --silent
scripts.release: npm login && npm version patch --minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
